weekly_top_story.headline: US Senate passes bill to end longest government shutdown in history
weekly_top_story.summary: The US Senate has passed legislation to reopen the federal government after the longest shutdown in American history, resolving a prolonged political deadlock that disrupted public services and economic activity.

stories.headline: France to deliver up to 100 Rafale warplanes to Ukraine
stories.summary: France has announced plans to supply Ukraine with up to 100 fully-equipped Rafale fighter jets, marking a significant escalation in Western military support amid the ongoing conflict with Russia.

stories.headline: US confirms deadly 'kinetic strike' against alleged drug smugglers in Caribbean
stories.summary: The US has confirmed carrying out a lethal strike against suspected drug smuggling vessels in the Caribbean, resulting in multiple fatalities and raising concerns about regional security and diplomatic tensions.

stories.headline: Car bomb explosion kills 12 at judicial complex in Islamabad, Pakistan
stories.summary: A car bomb exploded in the parking lot of a busy judicial complex in Islamabad, killing at least 12 people and injuring several others, highlighting ongoing security challenges in the region.
